snippet: Washington is expected to finish above .500 or even contend for a postseason berth this season, which could further enhance the team’s bottom line since it moved from Montreal.
abstract: Washington Nationals are expected to finish above .500 and even contend for a playoff berth for the first time since 2005 when they moved from Montreal; with a core of young talent, the Nationals are meriting attention in a city full of distractions.
lead_paragraph: Washington is expected to finish above .500 or even contend for a postseason berth this season, which could further enhance the team’s bottom line since it moved from Montreal.

headline.seo: Nationals Begin to See Their Moves Pay Off
headline.main: Nationals Beginning to See Their Moves Pay Off
headline.print_headline: Nationals Beginning to See Their Moves Pay Off
